channel.title: dynamic modelling on Tim Ballard
channel.description: Recent content in dynamic modelling on Tim Ballard

item.title: ORM Paper - first meeting of the year
item.description: Attendees: Andrew, Hector Items for discussion Finalising the model Choose final model (need to pick which performance function works best). Model 1: skill = 1 - exp(-delta*practice) change_in_performance = (k1 + k2*skill) / (1 + exp(-(k3 + k4*effort + k5*skill))) Comments: Regression look to this equation is not ideal. Model 2: skill = skill_max - (skill_max - skill_min)exp(-deltapractice) performance = performance_a - (performance_a - performance_0)*exp(-delta*practice) change_in_performance = skill / (1 + exp(-(k1 + k2*effort)) Comments: This model does not influence the slope of the function, but thatâ€™s probably.
